DOC.brief_summary: The objective conduct contralateral prospective clinical study compare safety , efficacy , quality vision STAAR Surgical Co. Toric Implantable Contact Lens TICL ) versus Custom Laser Vision Correction ( Q-LASIK ) human eye correction myopia astigmatism .
DOC.brief_title: Randomized , Prospective Comparison Outcome Toric Implantable Contact Lens ( TICL ) Q-LASIK Correction Myopia With Astigmatism
DOC.criteria: Age : 2145 year old Documented stable refraction least 1 year ( 3.0 8.0D myopia 1.0 4.0D astigmatism SE 3.5 10D BSCVA : 20/20 good Pupil diameter : small 7mm mesopic condition Contact lens discontinue 3 week 1 week hard soft wearer respectively Evidence progressive acute disease Evidence connective tissue disease clinically significant atopic disease ACD le 2.8mm endothelium ECC le 2200 cells/mm2 Narrow angle anterior chamber Residual stromal thickness le 280 micron
